channel.title: Object on object
channel.description:
Im trying to add herblore , just i dont know how to Add object on a object wich gives xp + an item
I was looking for a little tut but cant find any please help?

item.title: Object on object
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

if(itemUsed == 590 && useWith == 1521) { deleteItem(1521, getItemSlot(1521), 1); makeGlobalObject(absX,absY,2732,2,10); setAnimation(733); addSkillXP(7000, 11); sendMessage("You light the logs"); }

theres a code for lighting logs, change the ids to do watever it is ur doing

item.title: Object on object
item.dc:creator: @shadytheone shadytheone
item.description:
@shadytheone wrote:

u mean Item on an object??

because u cant have a object in ur inventory
i just made a code for ya
well when u use tarromin on a chest u get a str potion and 250 Herblore experience

wel , il make the Item On Object Code For Ya to help u out!

Here It Is:

else if (useItemID == 253 && atObjectID == 4126) // Made By Shady { sendMessage("you made a str potion!"); // the message when u do it addSkillXP((250 * playerLevel[15]), 15); // this is the Exp u get the when u make the str potion deleteItem(253, getItemSlot(253), 1); //this delete's the tarromin addItem(115, 1); //this replace's the deleted tarromin with a str potion setAnimation(885); // this is the animation u do when u make the str potion }

Put this where the other item on objects are
under the }

now adding the chest

Now search for something like this in ur client.java :

public void NewObjects() {

and go to the end and add this :

    makeGlobalObject(XXXX, YYYY, 4126, 1, 10); // Herblore Chest

Change the XXXX to the X coordinates and the YYYY to the Y coords where u want the chest to be.
now save and compile
— there u go u just added ur first herblore Stuff —
try making more
i hope i helped!

~ Shady ~

Read full topic
